title: Textbook publishing revenue in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2015.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2012.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012 to 2010.
gold: The timeline presents data on textbook publishing revenue generated in the United States from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , the revenue amounted to 8.79 billion U.S. dollars .
